data.text: Ka nnyimbire omwagalwa wange oluyimba
Era n’agirima n’agiggyamu amayinja gonna,
“Era kaakano abatuuze b’omu Yerusaalemi n’abasajja b’omu Yuda,
Ate kiki kye nandikoledde ennimiro yange eno,
Kaakano muleke mbabuulire
Era ndigireka n’ezika,
Ennyumba ya Isirayiri
Zibasanze mmwe aboongera amayumba ku ge mulina,
Mukama Katonda alayidde nga mpulira nti,
Kubanga yika kkumi ez’ennimiro y’emizabbibu zinaavangamu ekibbo kimu,
Zibasanze abo abakeera enkya ku makya
Ababeera n’ennanga n’entongooli, ebitaasa n’endere,
Abantu bange kyebavudde bagenda mu buwaŋŋanguse
Amagombe kyegavudde gagaziya omumiro gwago,
Buli muntu alitoowazibwa,
Naye Mukama Katonda ow’Eggye aligulumizibwa olw’obwenkanya,
Endiga ento ziryoke zirye ng’eziri mu malundiro gaazo,
Zibasanze abo abasikaasikanya ebibi byabwe
Aboogera nti, “Ayanguyeeko, ayite mu bwangu tulabe ky’anaakola.
Zibasanze abo abayita ekibi ekirungi
Zibasanze abo abeeraba ng’abalina amagezi,
Zibasanze abo abazira mu kunywa omwenge
abejjeereza abatemu olw’enguzi
Kale ng’olulimi lw’omuliro bwe lwokya ekisagazi ekikalu,
Noolwekyo obusungu bwa Mukama Katonda bubuubuukira ku bantu be,
Era aliyimusiza eggwanga eriri ewala bbendera,
Tewali n’omu akooye, tewali n’omu yeesittala.
Obusaale bwabwe bwogi,
Okuwuluguma kwabwe kuliba nga okw’empologoma,
Era ku lunaku olwo baliwuumira ku munyago gwabwe
